channel.title: Grep on 小楼一夜听春雨
channel.description: Recent content in Grep on 小楼一夜听春雨

item.title: Grep Exclude Many File
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: grep 同时排除多个关键字,多个文件 Step grep -v 排除文件 | grep -v 排除文件 1 2 3 4 5 tom@tom-w10vbud16:~$ ifconfig | grep inet | grep -v inet6 | grep -v 127.0.0.1 inet addr:172.17.0.1 Bcast:0.0.0.0 Mask:255.255.0.0 inet addr:10.88.88.130 Bcast:10.88.88.255 Mask:255.255.255.0 inet addr:10.42.0.0 Bcast:0.0.0.0 Mask:255.255.255.255 tom@tom-w10vbud16:~$ Ref https://blog.csdn.net/qq70945934/article/details/77573870
